description:
regexp: identify that submatch is also known as capturing group
Mention the syntax is defined by the regexp/syntax package.
Fixes issue 3953.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=25b2d31c3148 ***

regexp: identify that submatch is also known as capturing group
Mention the syntax is defined by the regexp/syntax package.
Fixes issue 3953.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7702044

It'd be nice if one could search on http://golang.org/pkg/regexp/ for
[group] and find something, though.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
